1112121.content:
Timmy's parents open the door harshly and quick, like the subtlety of a rhino in a china shop. Timmy's fairies quickly poof into their goldfish form to not be seen.

"Hey mom, hey dad, uh is there something you have to say?" Timmy said while trying to stretch out his shirt so his no grown belly wouldn't be noticed.

"Why we sure do son. Oh should I tell him or you?" Mom asked.

"I think I'd like to break the news to Timmy," Dad said. Timmy did not like where this was going though. "Timmy, your mother is pregnant!" Timmy let go of his shirt when he heard the news, causing his parents to notice his pregnant belly.

"Timmy, are you feeling well? You look, how do I put this nicely, 'bigger' than before," Timmy's mom pointed out.

"Yeah," Timmy's dad then went eye level to Timmy's stomach and started poking it, "oh if I didn't know any better, I would say that you look preg-"

"It was mom's cooking!" Timmy screamed out loud, lying to keep interest away from him. It worked as his parents began to crack up.

"Oh sorry dear, you know I can make a mean 6 layered bean salad," Timmy's mom said.

"Don't worry son, it will go away in a few days. I remember the last time your mother got me bloated and sick one long time ago,"

"It was possibly the best and worst honeymoon we'd ever had,"

Timmy interrupted their odd trip down memory lane to get back to the original subject at hand. "So wait, mom's gonna have a baby? Aren't I already a great bundle of joy?" Timmy turned to notice his Fairy Goldfishes and the one with the pink eyes shaking her head. Don't pretend like you didn't want to have a baby brother after what Cosmo did to you' Wanda said in her head.

"Son you still are a bundle," Timmy's dad said awkwardly.

"And sometimes you are a bit of a hard bundle, sometimes even disappointing," Timmy's mom said.

"So we decided that why not try again and see how we do this time," Timmy's dad then placed his arm around mom and they laughed again.

"Also we're going to celebrate this occasion with how we celebrated when we were having you. Extreme sports!" Timmy's parents then ripped off their clothes to reveal sporting gear underneath them, and somehow a helmet and new shoes.

"I don't think that's safe," Timmy said, "And I don't think I can join you two," Timmy looked down at his belly and patted it a bit.

"Not with that gut your not. Plus we weren't going to invite you and just let Vicky babysit you today," Timmy's dad blurted out, causing Timmy to shriek in fear like a girl.

"Anyway, goodbye Timmy!" Timmy's parents said in unison. They then left the room and slammed the door behind them. Wanda and Cosmo proofed out of the fishbowl, and Timmy feel to the ground while still in fear.

"I can't let Vicky get near me. She'll kill my baby before I even get a chance to get it out of me," Timmy said.

"Plus your parents are now having a baby, so your wish turned out to be extremely pointless," Cosmo said, causing Wanda to zip him up again. "Oh no, not again! Agggh!" Cosmo muffled while flying around like an idiotic bee.

"Ignore him for now. So, what should we do?" Wanda asked.

Timmy sat up and replied with a malicious smile, "Oh I have an idea, but first I wish my mom's pregnancy to accelerate as quick as mines,"

"Is it for your parents focus on their pregnancy acting odd, and so on the day of both of your births, we can make it seem as if she was carrying twins?" Wanda exposed out as quick as a machine gun.

"Yes Wanda," Timmy said in awe, being amazed Wanda knew exactly what he was thinking about, "And for Vicky..."

She made her choices and the employees went straight away in packing them and proceeded to cash her out with the purchases paying them with wads of cash. She leaves the store wearing a cute pink sweater with hearts as for some reason she was liking the color pink, some pants that were stretchable and cover her belly almost hugging her that also gave support. Some employees carried the bags with her purchased clothes and followed her outside the mall and to her limo. “Goodnight sport, love you too.” Wanda replied in a loving tone.

*4:45am, Cosmo and Wanda’s castle*

Wanda was trying to get some sleep but she keeps shaking and breaking out in a cold sweat. So she woke up and flew to the bathroom trying to find something to help her sleep.

“*yawn* I guess this is the price you pay for motherhood.” Wanda said in a groggy tone.

Wanda then opened the door, turned on the lights and a approached the mirror. It was there where Wanda saw that she had…

1253312112113112111232.content:
Wanda rubbed her eyes a bit as she thought she saw her belly getting bigger and bigger. But then her widen with horror as her body started to the the form of a sphere.. She had magical backup.

“Oh no.” Wanda muttered.
Wanda then beelined out of the bathroom and the bedroom and into the hallways of the castle while flying as fast as she could.

“I’ve got to get to my wand before I explode!!” Wanda yelled while her body continued to expand.

Within a minute Wanda made it to the main lobby of the castle where the wand container is located. However, Wanda could feel her arms and legs being absorbed into her ever growing body and she couldn’t even look down and see the floor. She felt that she could explode at any moment.

“I should’ve married the monkey.” Wanda stated to the wand container.

“Password accepted.” The container responded while its door opened.

Wanda quickly grabbed her wand and saw that her body was now a massive sphere with her hands, feet and head sticking out it. Her pajamas could barely cover a fourth of her body and it felt like she was ready to burst.

“I wish that I wouldn’t explode!” Wanda yelled.

With that her wand glowed with which was follow by a poof of smoke. When the smoke cleared Wanda looked at her reflection on the wand container glass and saw that she didn't explode, though she still looked like a large balloon.

“Timmy, are you alright sweetie?” Wanda asked in a worried tone but then sighed with relief when she felt a kick from within her body.

“I'm fine Wanda.” Timmy replied in a reassuring tone. “But I'm more concerned about you, what happened?”

“I'm afraid it was magical backup Timmy.” Wanda sighed.

“But it has not been that long since you made a wish.” Timmy said in a confused tone. “Why did it happen now?”

“I don't know sport.” Wanda replied. “But we'll have to contact someone in the morning who may know what is going on.”

“Who is it?” Timmy asked curiously.
1253312112113112111232.title: Magical backup

12533121121131121112321.content:
9:45 am Cosmo and Wanda’s castle*

After nearly exploding, Wanda fell asleep in the lobby floating like a balloon until morning. When Cosmo woke up and saw Wanda’s new condition he thought that she put on more weight which was followed by Wanda zipping up Cosmo’s mouth again. After having breakfast and putting on her normal outfit (which barely covered her body), Wanda contacted Dr. Rip Studwell about what happened and immediately showed up with some of his medical equipment. From there Dr. Rip Studwell examined Wanda on a makeshift examination table while Cosmo watched from a distance.

“So is everything okay Dr. Rip Studwell?” Wanda asked.

“Well since you were able to stop yourself from exploding your body is for the most part fine, while your baby is also fine and healthy.” Dr. Rip Studwell explained. “Also your current form won’t cause any complications when giving birth.”

“Well that’s a relief.” Timmy said with a sigh of relief.

“Indeed it is sport.” Wanda replied happily before redirecting her attention to her doctor. “But Dr. Rip Studwell how did this happen?”

“Allow me to explain.” Dr. Rip Studwell stated while preparing a visual aide. “As you know male fairies are traditionally the ones who get pregnant.” “So when Cosmo made that premature wish and you got pregnant with your godchild it created a hormonal imbalance within your body’s system.” “So when you went to bed last night, the imbalance caused your body to think that it went for a long period of time without making a wish and that caused the magical backup to happen.”

“Can’t Wanda wish herself to her ‘normal’ pregnant size?” Cosmo asked, finally unzipping his mouth.

“It wouldn’t work.” Dr. Rip Studwell replied. “If she tried that, the imbalance would just cause her to re-inflate.” “The only way for Wanda to deflate and stay that way is for the cause of her body’s imbalance to be removed.”

“So you’re saying that until I give birth to Timmy, I’m stuck like this.” Wanda asked.

“In a nutshell, yes.” Dr. Rip Studwell replied. “But I have good news.”

“And bad news.” Cosmo and Wanda said simultaneously.

Then Dr. Rip Studwell went to his medical bag and pulled out what look like a box of band-aids.

“What are those?” Wanda asked curiously.

“The good news, these patches will temporarily correct the hormonal imbalance within your body.” Dr. Rip Studwell explained. “Just put one on the back of your hand and your body will deflate to its ‘normal’ pregnant size.” “However, each patch only lasts for about an hour and fifteen minutes and when times up you’ll re-inflate to your current condition.” “When the patch is green it means you have plenty of time, when it turns yellow it means time is starting to run out and it turns red it means time is just about up.” “Now your only allowed to use one patch at a time and your not allowed to use more than two patches a day.”

“So what’s the bad news?” Cosmo asked curiously.

“Your insurance doesn't cover house calls.” Dr. Rip Studwell stated while giving Wanda the patch box and giving Cosmo the bill for his services.

“Hold on, won’t Cosmo suffer from magical backup since he can't make wishes for Timmy?” Wanda asked curiously.

“Just let him grant a couple wishes for you a day and he’ll be fine.” Dr. Rip Studwell replied. “Now if you’ll excuse I me, my favorite show is on in five minutes.”

With Dr. Rip Studwell poofed away with his medical equipment leaving Cosmo and Wanda alone with the patch box and a medical bill.

“So Wanda are you going to use one of those patches?” Cosmo asked curiously.

Wanda thought about it for a minute and decided too...
12533121121131121112321.title: Contact Dr. Rip Studwell

"Cosmo, I wish that all of my furniture in the castle was accommodated to my size." Wanda stated.

12533121121131121112321212.content:
As Wanda finished drying herself off, she poofed up a green and white striped maternity dress which fit her nice and comfy(even though it kind of made her look like a giant beach ball). She decided to relax and watch some TV, so headed towards the big TV room.

"How are you holding up Wanda?" Timmy asked curiously.

"Well the use of arms is severely limited and I can't see my feet which have been mostly absorbed into the round mass that is my body, but I still feel good." Wanda replied. "The magical backup is easier to deal with when you don't have to worry about exploding."

Before she knew it, Wanda made it to the TV room where she lay down on the enlarged recliner and watched her favorite shows (even though her spherical body partially blocked the screen). About halfway through the first program, Wanda felt a familiar sensation and felt her body inflate again.

"Did my body get bigger again?" Wanda thought to herself.

Just then Wanda's wand started vibrating and she picked it up to see what was going on.

"Hello?" Wanda answered.

"Hi Wanda, its Dr. Rip Studwell." The voice on the other line answered. "Just want to tell you a few things about your condition that I forgot to mention earlier." "First while you won't explode, you will still experience some inflation at random times." "The patches will help with this because when they are used up, you'll re-inflate to the form you took when you made the wish to not explode." "Second, when you have the patches on keep the wishing to a minimum." "Making wishes will cause the patch's time limit to shorten, but the time shaved off of the patches depends on the caliber of the wish made." "Just wanted to give you a heads up, bye."

With that Dr. Rip Studwell hung up and left Wanda to process the new information given.

"Sounds like a lot to take in." Timmy said.

"It is sport, but it's nothing that I can't handle." Wanda replied confidently. "Besides our lazy day has only just started." "What I would like to do next would be…"

“So what were you going to say Wanda?” Timmy asked.

“You know what sweetie, I forgot.” Wanda stated after thinking for a bit. “It's probably for the best, I think that was just the mood swings talking earlier.” “Besides, I'm already a spherical balloon that will occasionally get bigger on my own.” “I just need to remember to use those patches before I get too big.” “Right now get could go for a bite to eat.”

With that Wanda floated out of the hall of mirrors and into the Timmy’s favorite food room for a meal. Wanda grabbed a large pizza, topping it with nachos and mozzarella sticks as well as a large root beer. Wanda polished her meal off in under three minutes before munching on a big tub of popcorn.
